metadata.synopsis: After the main confrontation dialogue, one leader may attack the other. This dialogue the plays if the Adventurer Leader is the sole survivor regardless of who attacked who.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro Steps:1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto 212.35, 26.28, 400.384. Advance towards the gate to trigger Attack on Den cinematic.5. killcombat6. Advance into the Grove.7. KO or let Zevlor KO Aradin.8. Talk with Aradin

1.speaker: Aradin
1.text: First I damn near die at the hands of goblins. Then a foulblood takes his frustrations out on me.

0.speaker: Aradin
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: He clears his throat, looking flustered as he barks at the tieflings. NodeContext: Flustered and then angry. Trying to be authorative and threatening. Pushing the panic and fear down.

2.speaker: Aradin
2.text: First I damn near die at the hands of goblins. Then I get sucker-punched by a bloody randomer.
